attributes.action: give the British Public a referendum on the whole European issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the run up to the 1997 General Election your manifesto clearly stated that the British People would be given a referendum on Europe, we the undersigned would like one NOW

rejection.details:
There are currently a number of similar petitions on the site: 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Lisbon-ref/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/ECTTOL/ http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/LeaveEU1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
